unnormalised: Then comes the real challenge: estimating quantities. Mom wants "thoda sa dhaniya" (a little coriander), but how much is "thoda sa"? Is it 50 grams? 100 grams? Suddenly, you regret not paying attention in math class when they taught about estimations. You end up grabbing a bunch that looks about right, hoping it’s not enough to feed an entire colony of rabbits. The same goes for "ek pav" (250 grams) of green chilies. Why can't they just say 250 grams?

You feel pressured to add a few extra grams, even though you're not sure what you'll do with all that ginger. Maybe make ginger tea bath bombs?
